tooltip.redoEdit: Redo the last command that was undone
tooltip.toggleMultiMode: Multi selection mode. Work with Tweak
tooltip.toggleOrtho: Change between orthogonal view or perspective view
tooltip.geometryBackground: Background color of the Geometry window
tooltip.vertexDisplay: Change how vertices are normally displayed
tooltip.unselectedSize: Size in pixels of unselected vertices (0.0 = not shown)
tooltip.selectedSize: Size in pixels of selected vertices
tooltip.magnetVertexSize: Size in pixels of magnet mask vertices
tooltip.edgeDisplay: Change how edges are normally displayed
tooltip.unselectedWidth: Width in pixels of unselected edges
tooltip.selectedWidth: Width in pixels of selected edges
tooltip.hardEdgeWidth: Width in pixels of hard edges
tooltip.highlighting: Change how mouse-over highlighting is normally displayed
tooltip.unselected: Color for highlighting of items which are not yet selected
tooltip.selected: Color for highlighting of items which are already selected
tooltip.selection: Change how selected items are normally displayed
tooltip.selectionColor: Color for items currently selected (but not currently highlighted by mouse-over)
tooltip.informationText: Change how the Status Bar shown in Geometry windows is normally displayed. (Note: the Information Line options are in the User Interface tab)
tooltip.infoText: Color of text in the Status Bar
tooltip.infoBackground: Color of background for Status Bar
tooltip.infoVerbose: Show additional information (if available) about the selected items
tooltip.normalDisplay: Change how Normals are displayed; see [View | Show | Show Normals] which toggles display of normals
tooltip.normalLength: Length in wings units of normals
tooltip.material: Change how materials are displayed in the normal Wings 3D workspace
tooltip.axes: Change the way the Axes are displayed
tooltip.axesToGrid: Limit the display of the axes to within the ground-plane grid area, instead of out to 'infinity'
tooltip.miniAxis: Display the moving Mini Axes in the bottom left of the Geometry window. This option is independent of the display of the main axes, see [View | Show | Axes]
tooltip.xPlusColor: Color of the standard X axe, in positive direction
tooltip.yPlusColor: Color of the standard Y axe, in positive direction
tooltip.zPlusColor: Color of the standard Z axe, in positive direction
tooltip.xMinusColor: Color of the standard X axe, in negative direction
tooltip.yMinusColor: Color of the standard Y axe, in negative direction
tooltip.zMinusColor: Color of the standard Z axe, in negative direction
tooltip.grid: Change the way the ground plane is displayed
tooltip.gridColor: Color of the ground-plane grid lines
tooltip.forceAAGrid: Always show the grid when the view is aligned along one of the major axes, regardless of current [View | Show | Ground Plane] setting
tooltip.forceAAOrtho: Always go into Orthographic mode when the view is aligned along one of the major axes (see X, Y, Z Hotkeys) regardless of current [View | Orthographic] setting
tooltip.cameraPref: Wings3D assumes a Three Button Scroll Mouse, and Wings3D Camera Mode
tooltip.mouseButtons: Set the option to One, Two or (the default) Three button mouse
tooltip.cameraMode: Camera mode and behavior. Linked to the number of mouse buttons.  The default is Wings 3D. Nendo camera mode can be used with a one- or two-button mouse, and Blender camera mode can be used with a two- or three-button mouse. All other camera modes require a three-button mouse
tooltip.rotationSpeed: Step size in pixels moved when the mouse is used to rotate the scene
tooltip.panSpeed: Step size in pixels moved when the mouse is used to pan the scene
tooltip.keyPanSpeed: Step size in pixels moved when the Arrow keys are used to pan the scene
tooltip.scrollWheel: Change the speed and behavior of zooming using a scroll wheel
tooltip.wheelZoom: Use the scroll wheel to zoom
tooltip.aimZoom: Enables auto aiming while zooming the camera in when part of the model is highlighted
tooltip.zoomFactor: Percentage change in size of scene when zooming in/out
tooltip.altZoomFactor: Alternative zoom factor setting, to give a choice of (slower) zooming behavior
tooltip.unidirectionalCamera: Allows use of the scroll wheel to Pan in one direction (with Ctrl+Scroll) or Rotate (with Shift+Scroll) around one axis. The Alt key is used to pan/rotate in the opposite direction. This feature is an alternative to tumbling and dragging using mouse movements in camera mode
tooltip.wheelPanRotate: Switch on use of scroll wheel for unidirectional camera mode
tooltip.infoLineHelpString: Display the additional options in the Information Line
tooltip.panSpeed: Step size in pixels moved when the scroll wheel is used to pan the scene
tooltip.rotationStepDegree: Step size in degrees when the scroll wheel is used to rotate the scene
tooltip.userInterface: Chose different colors and transparency settings for the workspace
tooltip.colors: Change the appearance of the workspace
tooltip.geometryBackground: Background color of the Geometry windows
tooltip.menubarBackground: Background color of the Main Menu
tooltip.menubarText: Color of the Main Menu text
tooltip.menuBackground: Background color of the Context Menu
tooltip.menuText: Color of the Context Menu text
tooltip.menuHighlight: Background color of a selected command in a Context Menu
tooltip.menuHighlightText: Color of the text of a selected command in a Context Menu
tooltip.infoLineBackground: Background color of the Information Line
tooltip.infoLineText: Color of the text in the Information Line
tooltip.interfaceIcon: Choose the style of the Menu Toolbar Icons
tooltip.advancedMiscPref: Ragbag of useful options which have nowhere else to go
tooltip.vectorLength: Length of vector in wings units of secondary selections
tooltip.vectorWidth: Width in pixels of selected vector
tooltip.clippingPlaneIndicator: Change how Clipping Plane are displayed
tooltip.dragPreference: Allows you to customize mouse sensitivity/speed during distance, scaling and rotation dragging operations
tooltip.mouseDraggingSpeed: Set relative speed for distance mouse motion
tooltip.mouseScalingSpeed: Set relative speed for scaling mouse motion
tooltip.mouseRotatingSpeed: Set relative speed for rotation mouse motion
tooltip.autoRotate: Default settings for the Auto Rotate camera view (U Hotkey)
tooltip.dealy: Speed of rotation, which can be changed by +/- while rotating

msgstr.body_status: Object ${this.name} has ${this.polygonSize} polygons, ${this.edgeSize} edges, and ${this.vertexSize} vertices
